title: Drawing, "Cream Soup Saucer for Cas", 1942
medium:
Graphite, ruled border in graphite
Support: vellum
markings: Stamps: Designer's stamp in graphite at lower right; see inscription
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with measurements; at lower right: leave old tool/forfoot/change size/Febr.8. E.Z; at upper right: I; at lower right corner: CREAMED SOUP SAUCER/Drawn by - J.B.D. 11-16-42 Designed by - E.S. Zeisel/ Scale - All Dim. in inches DRG. NO. 1

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Cream Soup Saucer for Cas", 1942.
1942. Graphite, ruled border in graphite
Support: vellum. Gift of Eva Zeisel. 1993-11-8.
